subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. said Wednesday that Dwight Howard was sanctioned for his elbow on Sixers center Samuel Dalembert in Game 5 on Tuesday night.
snippet: The N.B.A. said Wednesday that Dwight Howard was sanctioned for his elbow on Sixers center Samuel Dalembert in Game 5 on Tuesday night.
